name: Samsung 55" 4K Smart TV
description: Stunning 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR support, built-in streaming apps, and voice control. Experience crystal-clear picture quality and immersive entertainment.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: Lightweight and powerful 13-inch laptop with Apple M2 chip, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Perfect for work, creativity, and everyday computing with all-day battery life.

name: Sony WH-1000XM6 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with exceptional sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and touch sensor controls. Perfect for music lovers and frequent travelers.

name: iPhone 16 Pro 128GB
description: Latest iPhone with titanium design, A18 Pro chip, and advanced camera system. Features USB-C, Action Button, and incredible performance for photography and gaming.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Enhanced gaming console with vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, improved audio, and 64GB internal storage. Enjoy gaming at home or on the go with this versatile system.
